courses.title: Document Management System
courses.description: Engineered a document management system supporting secure file upload, download, archiving, and deletion.Integrated third-party REST APIs to enhance metadata handling and document workflows.
courses.instructor: Java , SpringBoot , PostgreSQL , JDBC , ReactJS , Hibernate , Spring Security

courses.title: Kanban Board Application
courses.description: Developed a Kanban-style task management platform enabling dynamic task creation, updates, and stage transitions.Created robust REST APIs and a responsive React.js frontend for seamless user experience.
courses.instructor: Java , ReactJS , SpringBoot , MySQL , Hibernate , JDBC , Spring Security

courses.title: Distributed Voting System
courses.description: Build the voting system in a real-world election scenario, achieving a significant increase in voter turnout and trust in the electoral process. Designed and implemented smart contracts using Solidity on the Ethereum blockchain, enabling tamper-proof and immutable voting records.

courses.title: MecHub
courses.description: Successfully Built the mechanic calling application, achieving widespread adoption and, resulting in increased efficiency and convenience in the automotive industry.Designed and implemented the frontend interface using NextJs and TailwindCss, ensuring a user-friendly experience . Developed a robust backend infrastructure using Node.js and MongoDB , enabling seamless communication between users and mechanics in real-time.

courses.title: Akhbaar
courses.description: A Daily News Application Built which includes category wise articles and news articles.
